page.title: 11MR.BRYAN
page.content: Mr.Bryan is an elderly Welford resident who has lived in Welford all his life. He is coming up to 80 years of age. He gave us the following information: The types of jobs people do have not changed very much.There used to be tennis and cricket clubs in Welford. There weren't many houses built before the first World war,but there are alot now.Clothing has not changed very much since 1955. Most of the changes there have been are good. Behaviour amongst young people was very bad. Long hair was not in fashion in 1955. Thirty years ago you grew your own vegetables in the garden because you could'nt buy them in the shops. by Sharon,Alison & Emma
